mapper.sql:
SELECT T.ID, T.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME, T.CARD_NAME, T.CARD_NUMBER, T.CARD_TYPE, T.BANK_TYPE_ID, B.BANK_NAME, T.CARD_STATUS, T.BOUND_AT FROM MALL_USER_BANK_CARD T LEFT JOIN MALL_USER U ON U.ID = T.USER_ID LEFT JOIN MALL_BANK_TYPE B ON B.ID = T.BANK_TYPE_ID WHERE 1=1
AND T.ID = '${params.id}'
AND U.NICKNAME LIKE '%${params.nickname}%'
AND T.CARD_NAME LIKE '%${params.cardName}%'
AND T.CARD_NUMBER LIKE '%${params.cardNumber}%'
AND B.BANK_NAME LIKE '%${params.bankName}%'
